name: Lion (itch) (Itizso)
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.9.6a Details Title Lion Model No. LN-08 Series Game & Watch ( Gold Series ) Manufacturer Nintendo Release Date April 29, 1981 Chipset Sharp SM5A ( 32.768 kHz ) Description

Stop lions from escaping out of their cages.

Gameplay

Take control of two zoo keepers armed with chairs to prevent lions from escaping their cages. Each lion you manage to successfully force back in to the cage will earn you two points. If a lion manages to escape through one of the six exits of the cage the zoo keeper will be forced to flee up a tree and one miss will be scored. Three misses and the game is over.

Tips
  • If you manage to score 200 or 500 points all misses will be cleared!
  • In Game B there are three lions instead of two making the game more challenging than Game A.
